<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprofileprobepass"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprofileprobepass/#a525c05be6b1a63057c532b8b39415879">SampleProfileProbePass</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/passinfomixin">PassInfoMixin</a>&lt;SampleProfileProbePass&gt; &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses">PreservedAnalyses</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprofileprobepass/#a8c1accd469872b7673c9c8a033e30a0c">run</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;M, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af9c9208365fd9ce11392b4d79485e259">ModuleAnalysisManager</a> &amp;AM);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Pseudo probe distribution factor updater.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Sample profile annotation can happen in both LTO prelink and postlink. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// postlink-time re-annotation can degrade profile quality because of prelink</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// code duplication transformation, such as loop unrolling, jump threading,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// indirect call promotion etc. As such, samples corresponding to a source</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// location may be aggregated multiple times in postlink. With a concept of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// distribution factor for pseudo probes, samples can be distributed among</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// duplicated probes reasonable based on the assumption that optimizations</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// duplicating code well-maintain the branch frequency information (BFI). This</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pass updates distribution factors for each pseudo probe at the end of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// prelink pipeline, to reflect an estimated portion of the real execution</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// count.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pseudoprobeupdatepass"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pseudoprobeupdatepass/#a74f7c90ce16b5d0f31936ee5a677ae45">PseudoProbeUpdatePass</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/passinfomixin">PassInfoMixin</a>&lt;PseudoProbeUpdatePass&gt; &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> runOnFunction(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adce09a5a0de0e3177eb00e932734af2f">FunctionAnalysisManager</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#a83c7e5ca51099e4efa895791a02fb0ed">FAM</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
